from: The Hawtin Popperback Trousers offer a relaxed tapered fit that's loose from the thigh and finished with a wide cropped hem. Crafted from 100% cotton, these trousers feature Popperback rear pockets, an original Farah detail inspired by our archive. Other features include belt loops, angled pockets and a zip/button fastening, while a Farah label is stitched to the rear waist band to complete the trousers. 100% Cotton Relaxed Tapered Fit Button Fastening With A Zip Fly Belt Loops 2 Front Angled Pockets And 2 Popperback Rear Pockets Farah Label Stitched To The Rear Waistband Model Is 6'2" And Wears Size 32R Machine Wash Learn More About Our Trouser Fits Here

from: The Endmore Chinos provide a skinny fit that's designed to sit closer to the leg and offer a tailored look. Skinny from the thigh through to the hem, the twill fabrication ensures comfort while maintaining durability. Complete with pockets, belt loops and a zip/button fastening, these chinos are finished with original F tab inspired branding that dates back to Farah's bottoms in the 1950's. 97% Organic Cotton / 3% Elastane Skinny Fit Button Fastening With A Zip Fly Belt loops 2 Front Angled Pockets And 2 Buttoned Back Pockets Farah Label Stitched To The Rear Waistband. F Tab On Waist Model Is 6'2" And Wears Size 32R Machine Wash Learn More About Our Trouser Fits Here
